authenticationMethods.name: TACACS+ Group then Local
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using TACACS+ server group first, then fallback to local database if server unreachable
authenticationMethods.config: aaa authentication login default group {{tacacs.serverGroup}} local

authenticationMethods.name: Local then TACACS+ Group
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using local database first, then try TACACS+ server group
authenticationMethods.config: aaa authentication login default local group {{tacacs.serverGroup}}

authenticationMethods.name: TACACS+ Group Only
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using TACACS+ server group only, no fallback (warning: may lock out access)

authorizationMethods.name: Command Authorization (Privilege 15)
authorizationMethods.description: Authorize EXEC commands at privilege level 15 through TACACS+
authorizationMethods.config: aaa authorization commands 15 default group {{tacacs.serverGroup}} if-authenticated local

authorizationMethods.name: Command Authorization (All Levels)
authorizationMethods.description: Authorize EXEC commands at all privilege levels through TACACS+
authorizationMethods.config:
aaa authorization commands 0 default group {{tacacs.serverGroup}} if-authenticated local
aaa authorization commands 1 default group {{tacacs.serverGroup}} if-authenticated local
aaa authorization commands 15 default group {{tacacs.serverGroup}} if-authenticated local

authorizationMethods.name: EXEC Authorization Only
authorizationMethods.description: Authorize EXEC sessions without per-command authorization
authorizationMethods.config: aaa authorization exec default group {{tacacs.serverGroup}} if-authenticated local

accountingMethods.name: Command Accounting (Privilege 15)
accountingMethods.description: Log all commands at privilege level 15 to TACACS+ server
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting commands 15 default start-stop group {{tacacs.serverGroup}}

accountingMethods.name: Command Accounting (All Levels)
accountingMethods.description: Log all commands at all privilege levels to TACACS+ server

accountingMethods.name: EXEC Session Accounting
accountingMethods.description: Log EXEC session start and stop to TACACS+ server
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting exec default start-stop group {{tacacs.serverGroup}}

serverOptions.name: Server Timeout
serverOptions.description: Timeout in seconds before trying next server

serverOptions.name: Key Encryption Type
serverOptions.description: Method of key encryption for TACACS+ server

serverOptions.name: Single Connection
serverOptions.description: Maintain a single TCP connection for all TACACS+ communication

authenticationMethods.name: Login RADIUS then Local
authenticationMethods.description: Login using RADIUS server group first, then fallback to local database
authenticationMethods.config: aaa authentication login default group {{radius.serverGroup}} local

authorizationMethods.name: Network Authorization
authorizationMethods.description: Authorization for network services (VLAN, dACL, etc.)

accountingMethods.name: Network Accounting
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting network default start-stop group {{radius.serverGroup}}

accountingMethods.name: 802.1X Accounting
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting dot1x default start-stop group {{radius.serverGroup}}

accountingMethods.name: Identity Accounting
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting identity default start-stop group {{radius.serverGroup}}

serverOptions.name: Server Timeout
serverOptions.description: Timeout in seconds before trying next server

serverOptions.name: Retransmit Count
serverOptions.description: Number of times to retransmit request to server

serverOptions.name: Key Encryption Type
serverOptions.description: Method of key encryption for RADIUS server

serverOptions.name: Source Interface
serverOptions.description: Interface to use for RADIUS packets

serverOptions.name: Server Test
serverOptions.description: Probe radius server periodically to verify it's available

loadBalancingMethods.name: Least Outstanding
loadBalancingMethods.description: Send new requests to the server with the fewest pending requests

loadBalancingMethods.name: Host Hash
loadBalancingMethods.description: Distribute based on a hash of the client IP

loadBalancingMethods.name: Batch
loadBalancingMethods.description: Send batches of requests to each server in round-robin fashion

deadtimeSettings.description: Time in minutes to skip unresponsive servers

time.description: Time in seconds without response to mark server as dead

tries.description: Number of consecutive timeouts to mark server as dead

portSettings.name: Host Mode
portSettings.description: How many and what type of devices can authenticate on a port

options.name: Single Host
options.description: Only one MAC address can authenticate on the port

options.name: Multi-Domain
options.description: One device in data domain and one in voice domain

options.name: Multi-Host
options.description: One device authenticates and others get access (not secure)

portSettings.name: Control Direction
portSettings.description: Direction of traffic control during authentication

options.name: In
options.description: Only block inbound traffic before authentication

portSettings.name: Open Authentication
portSettings.description: Allow network access before authentication (monitor mode)

options.name: Enabled (Open/Monitor Mode)
options.description: Allow access regardless of authentication result

portSettings.name: Periodic Re-Authentication
portSettings.config:
authentication periodic
authentication timer reauthenticate server

portSettings.name: Inactivity Timeout
portSettings.description: Remove authenticated clients after period of inactivity

dot1xSettings.name: Tx Period
dot1xSettings.description: How often to send EAP requests to clients

dot1xSettings.name: Max Re-Auth Requests
dot1xSettings.description: Number of re-authentication attempts before failing

dot1xSettings.name: Quiet Period
dot1xSettings.description: Time in seconds to wait after authentication failure

dot1xSettings.name: Critical EAPOL
dot1xSettings.description: Send EAPOL success when entering critical authentication mode

mabSettings.name: MAB Authentication Type
mabSettings.description: How MAB formats the authentication request

options.name: EAP
options.description: Send as EAP credential (recommended for ISE)

options.name: PAP
options.config: mab request format attribute 1 groupsize 12 separator -

options.name: CHAP
options.config: mab request format attribute 1 groupsize 12 separator - chap

deploymentOptions.name: Sequential
deploymentOptions.description: Try 802.1X first, then MAB if 802.1X fails
deploymentOptions.policyMap:
policy-map type control subscriber DOT1X_MAB_POLICY
 event session-started match-all
  10 class always do-until-failure
   10 authenticate using dot1x priority 10
 event authentication-failure match-first
  5 class DOT1X_FAILED do-until-failure
   10 terminate dot1x
   20 authenticate using mab priority 20
  ...

deploymentOptions.name: Concurrent
deploymentOptions.policyMap:
policy-map type control subscriber CONCURRENT_DOT1X_MAB_POLICY
 event session-started match-all
  10 class always do-all
   10 authenticate using dot1x priority 10
   20 authenticate using mab priority 20
  ...

securityFeatures.name: BPDU Guard
securityFeatures.description: Protect against Layer 2 loops by disabling port if BPDU received

securityFeatures.name: PortFast
securityFeatures.description: Bypass spanning-tree listening and learning states

securityFeatures.name: Storm Control
securityFeatures.description: Limit broadcast, multicast, or unicast storms
securityFeatures.config:
storm-control broadcast level pps {{threshold}} 80
storm-control action trap

securityFeatures.name: DHCP Snooping
securityFeatures.description: Protect against rogue DHCP servers and DHCP starvation attacks
securityFeatures.config:
ip dhcp snooping
ip dhcp snooping vlan 1-4094
ip dhcp snooping information option
ip dhcp snooping limit rate 20

securityFeatures.name: Dynamic ARP Inspection
securityFeatures.description: Protect against ARP spoofing and man-in-the-middle attacks
securityFeatures.config:
ip arp inspection vlan 1-4094
ip arp inspection validate src-mac dst-mac ip

securityFeatures.name: IP Source Guard
securityFeatures.description: Restrict IP traffic based on DHCP snooping database

classMapDot1x.config:
class-map type control subscriber match-all DOT1X
 match method dot1x

class-map type control subscriber match-all DOT1X_FAILED
 match method dot1x
 match result-type method dot1x authoritative

class-map type control subscriber match-all DOT1X_NO_RESP
 match method dot1x
 match result-type method dot1x agent-not-found

class-map type control subscriber match-all DOT1X_TIMEOUT
 match method dot1x
 match result-type method dot1x method-timeout
 match result-type method-timeout

classMapMab.description: Class maps for MAC Authentication Bypass
classMapMab.config:
class-map type control subscriber match-all MAB
 match method mab

class-map type control subscriber match-all MAB_FAILED
 match method mab
 match result-type method mab authoritative

classMapCritical.config:
class-map type control subscriber match-all AAA_SVR_DOWN_AUTHD_HOST
 match result-type aaa-timeout
 match authorization-status authorized

class-map type control subscriber match-all AAA_SVR_DOWN_UNAUTHD_HOST
 match result-type aaa-timeout
 match authorization-status unauthorized

class-map type control subscriber match-any IN_CRITICAL_AUTH
 match activated-service-template CRITICAL_DATA_ACCESS
 match activated-service-template CRITICAL_VOICE_ACCESS

class-map type control subscriber match-none NOT_IN_CRITICAL_AUTH
 match activated-service-template CRITICAL_DATA_ACCESS
 match activated-service-template CRITICAL_VOICE_ACCESS

classMapMisc.config:
class-map type control subscriber match-all AUTHC_SUCCESS-AUTHZ_FAIL
 match authorization-status unauthorized
 match result-type success

policyMapEvents.name: Session Started Event
policyMapEvents.description: Actions when a new session is detected

options.name: Sequential Authentication
options.description: Try 802.1X first, then MAB if 802.1X fails
options.config:
event session-started match-all
 10 class always do-until-failure
  10 authenticate using dot1x priority 10

options.name: Concurrent Authentication
options.config:
event session-started match-all
 10 class always do-all
  10 authenticate using dot1x priority 10
  20 authenticate using mab priority 20

policyMapEvents.name: Authentication Failure Event
policyMapEvents.config:
event authentication-failure match-first
 5 class DOT1X_FAILED do-until-failure
  10 terminate dot1x
  20 authenticate using mab priority 20
 10 class AAA_SVR_DOWN_UNAUTHD_HOST do-until-failure
  10 clear-authenticated-data-hosts-on-port
  20 activate service-template CRITICAL_DATA_ACCESS
  30 activate service-template CRITICAL_VOICE_ACCESS
  40 authorize
  50 pause reauthentication
 20 class AAA_SVR_DOWN_AUTHD_HOST do-until-failure
  10 pause reauthentication
  20 authorize
 30 class DOT1X_NO_RESP do-until-failure
  10 terminate dot1x
  20 authenticate using mab priority 20
 40 class DOT1X_TIMEOUT do-until-failure
  10 terminate dot1x
  20 authenticate using mab priority 20
 50 class always do-until-failure
  10 terminate dot1x
  20 terminate mab
  30 authentication-restart 60

policyMapEvents.name: Agent Found Event
policyMapEvents.description: Actions when 802.1X supplicant is detected after MAB started
policyMapEvents.config:
event agent-found match-all
 10 class always do-until-failure
  10 terminate mab
  20 authenticate using dot1x priority 10

policyMapEvents.name: AAA Available Event
policyMapEvents.description: Actions when AAA server becomes available after being down
policyMapEvents.config:
event aaa-available match-all
 10 class IN_CRITICAL_AUTH do-until-failure
  10 clear-session
 20 class NOT_IN_CRITICAL_AUTH do-until-failure
  10 resume reauthentication

policyMapEvents.name: Inactivity Timeout Event
policyMapEvents.description: Actions when session is inactive for configured time
policyMapEvents.config:
event inactivity-timeout match-all
 10 class always do-until-failure
  10 clear-session

options.name: Standard
options.config:
event authentication-success match-all
 10 class always do-until-failure
  10 no-op

options.name: MACSec Encryption
options.config:
event authentication-success match-all
 10 class always do-until-failure
  10 activate service-template DEFAULT_LINKSEC_POLICY_SHOULD_SECURE

trackingOptions.name: Access Port Policy
trackingOptions.description: Device tracking policy for access ports
trackingOptions.config:
device-tracking policy IP-TRACKING
 limit address-count 4
 security-level glean
 no protocol ndp
 no protocol dhcp6
 tracking enable reachable-lifetime 30

trackingOptions.name: Trunk Port Policy
trackingOptions.description: Device tracking policy for trunk ports
trackingOptions.config:
device-tracking policy DISABLE-IP-TRACKING
 tracking disable
 trusted-port
 device-role switch

protocols.name: DHCP
protocols.config:
device-sensor filter-list dhcp list DS_DHCP_LIST
 option name host-name
 option name requested-address
 option name parameter-request-list
 option name class-identifier
 option name client-identifier
device-sensor filter-spec dhcp include list DS_DHCP_LIST

protocols.name: CDP
protocols.config:
cdp run
device-sensor filter-list cdp list DS_CDP_LIST
 tlv name device-name
 tlv name address-type
 tlv name capabilities-type
 tlv name platform-type
 tlv name version-type
device-sensor filter-spec cdp include list DS_CDP_LIST

protocols.name: LLDP
protocols.config:
lldp run
device-sensor filter-list lldp list DS_LLDP_LIST
 tlv name system-name
 tlv name system-description
 tlv name system-capabilities
device-sensor filter-spec lldp include list DS_LLDP_LIST

deviceSensor.globalConfig:
device-sensor notify all-changes
access-session attributes filter-list list DS_SEND_LIST
 cdp
 lldp
 dhcp
access-session accounting attributes filter-spec include list DS_SEND_LIST
access-session authentication attributes filter-spec include list DS_SEND_LIST

acls.name: ACL-OPEN
acls.description: Open access ACL for pre-authentication or critical authentication
acls.config:
ip access-list extended ACL-OPEN
 permit ip any any

acls.name: ACL-DEFAULT
acls.config:
ip access-list extended ACL-DEFAULT
 permit udp any eq bootpc any eq bootps
 permit udp any any eq domain
 permit icmp any any echo-reply
 permit icmp any any time-exceeded
 permit icmp any any unreachable
 deny ip any any

acls.name: ACL-AUTH-SERVER
acls.description: ACL to allow access to authentication servers only

acls.name: ACL-GUEST
acls.config:
ip access-list extended ACL-GUEST
 permit udp any eq bootpc any eq bootps
 permit udp any any eq domain
 permit tcp any any eq www
 permit tcp any any eq 443
 permit tcp any any eq 8080
 deny ip any any

radsec.serverGroupConfig:
aaa group server radius {{radsec.serverGroup}}
 server name {{radsec.serverName}}

policy.description: Prefer encryption but allow non-encrypted traffic

ip access-list extended ACL-OPEN
 permit ip any any

ip access-list extended ACL-DEFAULT
 permit udp any eq bootpc any eq bootps
 permit udp any any eq domain

 deny ip any any

acls.description: ACL to allow access to authentication servers only

acls.name: ACL-GUEST
acls.config:
ip access-list extended ACL-GUEST
 permit udp any eq bootpc any eq bootps
 permit udp any any eq domain
 permit tcp any any eq www
 permit tcp any any eq 443
 permit tcp any any eq 8080
 deny ip any any

radsec.serverGroupConfig:
aaa group server radius {{radsec.serverGroup}}
 server name {{radsec.serverName}}

policy.name: Should Secure
policy.description: Prefer encryption but allow non-encrypted traffic

authenticationMethods.name: TACACS+ Group then Local
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using TACACS+ server group first, then fallback to local database if server unreachable

authenticationMethods.name: Local then TACACS+ Group
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using local database first, then try TACACS+ server group

authenticationMethods.name: TACACS+ Group Only
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using TACACS+ server group only, no fallback (warning: may lock out access)

authorizationMethods.name: EXEC Authorization
authorizationMethods.config: aaa authorization exec {{tacacs.authzMethod}} group {{tacacs.serverGroup}} local if-authenticated

accountingMethods.name: Command Accounting (Level 0)
accountingMethods.description: Log all commands at privilege level 0 to TACACS+ server
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting commands 0 default start-stop group {{tacacs.serverGroup}}

accountingMethods.name: Command Accounting (Level 1)
accountingMethods.description: Log all commands at privilege level 1 to TACACS+ server
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting commands 1 default start-stop group {{tacacs.serverGroup}}

accountingMethods.name: Command Accounting (Level 15)
accountingMethods.description: Log all commands at privilege level 15 to TACACS+ server
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting commands 15 default start-stop group {{tacacs.serverGroup}}

serverOptions.name: Server Timeout
serverOptions.description: Timeout in seconds before trying next server

serverOptions.name: Key Encryption Type
serverOptions.description: Method of key encryption for TACACS+ server

webGui.config:
ip http authentication aaa login-authentication {{tacacs.authMethod}}
ip http authentication aaa exec-authorization {{tacacs.authzMethod}}

netconf.config:
yang-interfaces aaa authentication method-list {{tacacs.authMethod}}
yang-interfaces aaa authorization method-list {{tacacs.authzMethod}}

sshVty.config:
line vty 0 97
 exec-timeout {{timeout}} 0
 login authentication {{tacacs.authMethod}}
 authorization exec {{tacacs.authzMethod}}
 transport preferred none
 transport input ssh
 transport output none

authenticationMethods.name: RADIUS Group then Local
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using RADIUS server group first, then fallback to local database if server unreachable

authenticationMethods.name: Local then RADIUS Group
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using local database first, then try RADIUS server group

authenticationMethods.name: RADIUS Group Only
authenticationMethods.description: Authenticate using RADIUS server group only, no fallback (warning: may lock out access)

authorizationMethods.name: EXEC Authorization
authorizationMethods.config: aaa authorization exec {{radius.authMethod}} group {{radius.serverGroup}} local if-authenticated

accountingMethods.name: EXEC Accounting
accountingMethods.description: Log EXEC session start and stop to RADIUS server
accountingMethods.config: aaa accounting exec default start-stop group {{radius.serverGroup}}

serverOptions.name: Server Timeout
serverOptions.description: Timeout in seconds before trying next server

serverOptions.name: Retransmit Count
serverOptions.description: Number of times to retransmit request to server

serverOptions.name: Key Encryption Type
serverOptions.description: Method of key encryption for RADIUS server

serverOptions.name: Server Test
serverOptions.description: Probe radius server periodically to verify it's available

loadBalancingMethods.name: Least Outstanding
loadBalancingMethods.description: Send new requests to the server with the fewest pending requests

deadtimeSettings.description: Time in minutes to skip unresponsive servers

time.description: Time in seconds without response to mark server as dead

tries.description: Number of consecutive timeouts to mark server as dead

webGui.config:
ip http authentication aaa login-authentication {{radius.authMethod}}
ip http authentication aaa exec-authorization {{radius.authMethod}}

netconf.config:
yang-interfaces aaa authentication method-list {{radius.authMethod}}
yang-interfaces aaa authorization method-list {{radius.authMethod}}

sshVty.config:
line vty 0 97
 exec-timeout {{timeout}} 0
 login authentication {{radius.authMethod}}
 authorization exec {{radius.authMethod}}
 transport preferred none
 transport input ssh
 transport output none
